channel.title: Help! my server is getting nulled
channel.description: wow.. i noticed alot of ppl were dcing and i saw this on my server run.bat how do i fix? [code]Starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from 41.189.7.174:1585 Disconnecting bugged player null java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:34) at client.logout(client.java:11422) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:381) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:373) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:260) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (41.189.7.174) socket closed ClientHandler: Accepted from dynamic-adsl-94-36-113-249.clienti.tiscali.it:1795 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (dynamic-adsl-94-36-113-249.clienti.tiscali.it ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (85.175.75.245) [/code]

item.title: Help! my server is getting nulled
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Look at the methods your batch gives you and should point you in the right direction…

Read full topic
